Detailed Description

template<>
class oos::statement< row >

The statement class represents a prepared sql statement for an anonymous row.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ execute()

result<row> oos::statement< row >::execute ( )
inline

Executes the prepared statement and returns a result set. If the sql command was a select the result set holds the queried rows.

Returns
The result of the statement
